contents.item: The only thing on Earth you can count on is that there is nothing on Earth you can count on.

The history of the human race doesn’t make happy reading, does it? I’ve seen a lot of sadness during my time, but I’ve seen seen a lot of things that have kept my faith in humanity alive too. If there were no bad things in the world, we’d have nothing to measure the good against, would we? The light can only shine in darkness.
contents.owner: Peter James, The House on Cold Hill

contents.item: Sometimes God pulls us away from normal just long enough to begin something great in us.
Thank God for all my troubles, he made me trust in Him.
That's what I like about God. You get to know Him by His occasional absence.
contents.owner: Colum McCann, Let the Great World Spin

contents.item: Grace freely given by God.
God is the giver of life.
As a well spent day brings happy sleep, so life well used brings happy death.
My soul is in the sky.
contents.owner: William Shakespeare, A Midsummer Night's Dream

contents.item: We don't even know we are one family, one faith!
Happiness keeps you Sweet , Trials keep you Strong, Sorrows keep you Human, Failures keep you Humble, Success keeps you Glowing, But Only faith Keeps You Going! Be Happy Live Simply.
Remember it is not you who supports the root, but the root that supports you.
contents.owner: Apostle Paul -- Letter to the Romans

contents.item: What do you have that you did not receive? And if you did receive it, why do you boast as if you had not received it?
contents.owner: Apostle Paul -- Letter to the Romans

contents.item: If they do these things when the tree is green, what will they do when it is dry?
contents.owner: Jesus of Nazareth -- Book of Luke

contents.item: Faith is focus.

The Lord commands us to learn and discover all we can in this life. There's nothing wrong with wanting to know the mysteries of outer space or the latent powers of the mind. The problem comes when we desire to use that knowledge for our own gratification, rather than to build the kingdom of God.
contents.owner: Chris Heimerdinger, Gadiantons and the Silver Sword

contents.item: Each day is a giftTo embrace and welcome
contents.owner: Karen Hackel, The Whisper of Your Soul

contents.item: Doing what is right to GOD gives you peace not regret
My purpose is: What Lord? Where Lord? When Lord? Yes Lord!
The energy of life is force of faith.
